summary: A documentary on the evolution of the Oklahoma band The Flaming Lips.
cast: Bradley Beesley|Steve Burns|Dolly Coyne|Kenny Coyne|Marty Coyne|Tommy Coyne|Wayne Coyne|Jonathan Donahue|James Drozd|Steven Drozd|Vernon Drozd|The Flaming Lips|Adam Goldberg|Nic Harcourt|Gibby Haynes|Michael Ivins|Juliette Lewis|Todd Mein|Liz Phair|Cat Power|Christina Ricci|Kliph Scurlock|Paul Kent Sylvester|Allan Vest|Jack White|Meg White|Kelly Peterson
title: The Fearless Freaks
